fields.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the best in people and situations.
fields.ideal: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to prove themselves, no matter their past.
fields.bond: I am searching for my long-lost sibling, who disappeared when we were children.
fields.flaw: I am easily distracted by shiny objects and beautiful things.
fields.backstory: Once a member of a noble family, I was exiled from my home after a scandalous affair with a servant. Now I wander the land, searching for my lost sibling and trying to make a name for myself as a hero.
fields.physical: Toned and athletic, with a few scars from past battles.

fields.personality: Quiet and reserved, with a sharp wit and a dry sense of humor.
fields.ideal: The only way to survive in this world is to look out for yourself, because no one else will.
fields.bond: I will do anything to protect my sibling, who is the only family I have left.
fields.flaw: I have a quick temper and a tendency to lash out when I feel threatened.
fields.backstory: I grew up as a heir to a powerful wizarding family, but I was always the black sheep of the family. When my parents were killed in a magical accident, I was left to fend for myself, and I have been on the run ever since.
fields.physical: Slender but wiry, with a haunted look in my eyes.
